✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Formulas provided => easy to understand

The only thing I know about baseball is the name. I think it is necessary to improve the explanation so as not to be unfair to people who are unaware of the rules of this game.

For example, how do I discover this formula "PA-W-HBP-SAC". Explains better what is PA.

Nice one Westicles I am Robin_Hood

I tried to make it clearer.
Sorry about that, it was .4125.  I should have checked that.  It is fixed now.
